meanings.definition: The quality or state of being like cake in texture or consistency.
meanings.sent1: The cakiness of the muffin made it so soft and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy the cakiness of a well-made sponge cake.
meanings.sent3: The cakiness of the bread was so surprising, it felt like eating a cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her skin had a cakiness to it, smooth and delicate like a freshly baked cake.
meanings.sent5: The cakiness of the frosting was so rich and decadent, it melted in my mouth.
